text: This is the results breakdown of the local elections held in the Balearic Islands on 10 June 1987. The following tables show detailed results in the autonomous community's most populous municipalities, sorted alphabetically. ==Overall== {| class="wikitable" style="text-align:right; font-size:95%;" Majorca–Nationalist Left results are compared to the combined totals of Socialist Party of Majorca–Socialist Party of the Islands and Independent Democratic Candidacy in the 1983 elections. 4 United Left results are compared to the Communist Party of the Balearic Islands totals in the 1983 elections, not including results in the island of Menorca. 5 Agreement of the Left of Menorca results are compared to the combined totals of Socialist Party of Menorca and Communist Party of the Balearic Islands in the island of Menorca in the 1983 elections. |} |} ==City control== The following table lists party control in the most populous municipalities, including provincial capitals (shown in bold).
